Real-Time Variables

Real-time variable are stored in the database. You cannot delete or add variables to this table with DB Editor; if you need a variable that is not in the table, contact your system administrator.

You can configure the label, full name, comment and units. Prior to CareSuite 7.2, these properties were defined in templates. Other properties such as “copy forward” behavior, math function, and alert and artifact limits are still configured in templates.

l Set the properties of real-time variables

l Configure variable properties
